entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in MethodSymbol.get_ThisParameter() #63384
    17.4
  • Allow stepping through object init blocks #63383
  • IDE0230 (Convert to UTF-8 string literal) doesn't work #63380
  • 'Generate class' and 'Generate type' should handle records properly #63376
  • SymbolFinder does not find generated symbols #63375

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Classify 'u8' in Utf8 string literals as keyword #63381
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Simplify TypeKind condition #63379
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support generated-only symbols in SymbolFinder #63377
    Area-IDE
  • Use non-recursive DFS when visit binary expression #63374
    Area-IDE
  • Turn off Roslyn OOP #63373
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Add ExternalAccess for INavigateToSearcherService #63386
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #63355
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Install a .NET 6 runtime for the MSBuild Workspace unit tests. #63369
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the search of local function to non-recursive version #63338
    Area-IDE
